*Then it resets AGAIN because for shits and giggles*[/bq]
!http://assets.overclock.net.s3.amazonaws.com/0/01/0100e64f_vbattach127853.jpeg!
"Oh for fuck's sakes guys; you just had to keep screwing around with the universe.  Do you have any idea how long this is going to take to fix?  Sorry folks, but the universe is broken until it comes back in from repairs"
